Articles.Content:
The ship I am currently in does not show up in map view. Does anyone know why that might be? I can see all other craft (like stations, debris etc.) but not the one I'm controlling. I can't work out why this is. Thank you.

Edited December 8, 2014 by Wellington1815
Try moving the mouse to the top of the screen so the map filters drop down, click them to turn them on and off, your craft is likely in one of those filters
Go to your tracking station (would recomend after flight so you can still revert) and on the to of the ma view it should have a bunch of filters have those be active (all white) and it should po up
